articles.author: Rob Davies, Johana Bhuiyan
articles.title: Uber used Greyball fake app to evade police across Europe, leak reveals - The Guardian
articles.description: Firm’s bosses knew it was fooling authorities with tool showing phantom cars, documents show
articles.content: It was a trick as audacious as it was ingenious. When police or regulators opened the Uber app, they would see exactly what the public saw: dozens of cars crawling around the city, waiting to be summ… [+9008 chars]

articles.title: US backs Canada returning Russian pipeline turbines - CTV News
articles.description: The United States is supporting Canada's decision to allow a Canadian company to return turbines from a Russian pipeline that supplies natural gas to Germany, saying in the short term it was the right move, as European countries continue working towards reduc…
